oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Panel of American Women - Where Do We Go From Here?
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Panel of American Women; race relations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Booklet providing a list of a series of sources seeking to shed light on the problem of race relations in the United States.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: nine pages, folded to 5.5 x 8.5 in.
